thread.section_title: Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: workenmom
title: Great location
text:
Stayed here for a mother daughter trip over spring break. We had plays booked for each night of our trip. This was a perfect location to walk to all of the theaters even with heels and in the cold. The theaters are all within a few blocks in either direction. It's also an easy location to get to public transportation to get around the city. The bell captain was very helpful in getting taxis and arranging cars.
The rooms are nice but not 5 star. They are nicer than you usually find in NYC. The service was good. The food on the property was over priced in my opinion but it was probably appropriate for the city.
